slogan_description: At Sanskara, we connect textile industry waste with talented tribal artisans, transforming discarded scraps into beautiful, sustainable treasures.
how_it_works_description: A simple, transparent process to empower artisans and reduce waste.
feature_waste_stream_desc: Textile industries register and categorize their pre-consumer waste materials.
feature_artisan_skill_desc: Tribal artisans create detailed profiles, showcasing their unique skills and production capacity.
feature_intelligent_matching_desc: Our algorithm matches available textile waste with suitable artisans.
feature_ai_design_desc: Generate unique, upcycled product designs tailored to specific waste materials.
feature_marketplace_desc: A platform for artisans to list and sell their upcycled creations.
featured_creations_desc: Handcrafted with skill, passion, and a commitment to sustainability.
for_artisans_desc: Access a steady stream of materials, find new markets for your crafts, and gain economic independence. Join our community of creators.
for_industries_desc: Responsibly manage your pre-consumer waste, meet sustainability goals, and contribute to social upliftment. Partner with us for a circular economy.
marketplace_desc: Discover unique, handcrafted products made from upcycled materials. Each purchase supports an artisan and helps the planet.
ai_designs_desc: Unleash your creativity. Our AI helps you transform textile waste into stunning, marketable products. Select your materials and skills to get started.
create_your_design_desc: Fill out the details below to generate a unique upcycling template.
ai_weaving_magic: The AI is weaving its magic!
design_will_appear_here: Your generated design will appear here.
impact_desc: Transforming waste into worth, one thread at a time. See the difference we're making together.
waste_diverted_desc: Fabric that has been given a new life instead of being thrown away.
artisans_empowered_desc: Individuals and SHGs earning a sustainable livelihood through our platform.
products_created_desc: Unique, handcrafted items sold through the Sanskara Marketplace.
waste_diversion_over_time_desc: Tracking our progress in reducing textile waste, month by month.
artisans_page_desc: Join a movement that values your skill, provides sustainable income, and connects your craft to the world.
benefit_artisans_1: Access a consistent supply of diverse textile materials.
benefit_artisans_2: Reach a wider market for your handcrafted goods.
benefit_artisans_3: Receive fair prices for your skills and products.
benefit_artisans_4: Utilize AI-powered design tools to spark creativity.
benefit_artisans_5: Become part of a supportive community of creators.
benefit_artisans_6: Contribute to a sustainable, circular economy.
ready_to_turn_waste: Ready to Turn Waste into Wonder?
ready_to_turn_waste_desc: Register today to start receiving materials, creating new products, and earning from your craft. We handle the logistics, so you can focus on what you do best: creating.
industries_page_desc: Transform your textile waste into a powerful asset for social good and environmental responsibility.
benefit_industries_1: Achieve your corporate sustainability and circular economy goals.
benefit_industries_2: Responsibly manage and find value in pre-consumer textile waste.
benefit_industries_3: Receive detailed reports on waste diversion and social impact.
benefit_industries_4: Enhance your brand image by supporting local communities.
benefit_industries_5: Reduce landfill costs and environmental footprint.
benefit_industries_6: Gain a transparent and traceable supply chain for your waste materials.
join_circular_economy: Join Us in the Circular Economy
join_circular_economy_desc: Let's work together to create a closed-loop system for textiles. Register your industry to start mapping your waste streams and making a measurable impact.
artisan_registration_desc: Join our network of skilled creators. Fill out your details below to get started.
artisan_details_desc: Tell us a bit about yourself and your craft.
registration_submitted_desc: Thank you! We will review your details and be in touch soon.
